column4: "Hom ntsie me kasaa yie; Na wɔmma iyi nyɛ hom awerɛkyekyer."

column3: ma mo so menkasa; Na sɛ mekasa wie a
ana nyimpa na midzi mo nkɔmbɔ kyerɛ no? Na bɛyɛ dɛn na m’ahom nnkɛtsew?"
na hom ho mbow hom
column4: Na hom mfa hom nsa ntoto hom ano."

column3: m’akoma tu

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ndzebɔnyɛfo tsena ase
column3: Wɔkye
column5: na wɔyɛ akatakyi wɔ tumdzi mu yi?"

column2: "Hɔn mba tsintsim wɔ hɔn enyim ka hɔn ho
column3: Nyew
suro bi nnyi mu
column4: Na nkyii so Nyankopɔn ne ntsea bi nnyi hɔn do."

column3: na ɔnnyɛ kago
Na hɔn mbofraba so dzi ehuruhuruw."

column2: "Wɔma hɔn ndze do wɔ mpintsin na nsankutsen mu
column3: Na hɔn enyi gye wɔ atɛntɛbɛn ndze ho."
Na wosian kɔ samanadze wɔ asomdwee mu."
Fi hɛn do kɔ; Na yɛronnhwehwɛ w’akwan ho nyimdzee."

column2: "Otumfo no nye woana na yɛaasom no? Na sɛ yɛbɔ mpaa ma no a
column3: ebɛn mfaso na yebenya?"
hɔn ndzepa nnyi hɔnara hɔn nsamu: Ntsi ndzebɔnyɛfo apam mpar me."
Na mbusu so to hɔn
column4: Na Nyankopɔn kyɛ awerɛhow ma hɔn wɔ n’ebufuw mu?"

column2: "Mpɛn ahen so na ɔma wɔyɛ dɛ eburonan wɔ mframa enyim
column3: Na dɛ ntsɛw a ehum soa kɔ?"
Nyankopɔn dze ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi n’asotwee to hɔ ma ne mba

column2: "Ma nankasa n’enyiwa nhu noara ne sɛɛe
column3: Na ma ɔnnom Otumfo no n’ebufuhyew no bi."

column2: "Osiandɛ ebɛn adwen na ɔdwen wɔ ne fiemba ho
column3: Aber a woewie ne nda dzi no?"

column2: "Ana obi bɛkyerɛ Nyankopɔn nyimdzee? Osiandɛ ɔno na obu hɔn a wɔkrɔn atsɛn."

column3: Aber a no ho baa no na n’asomu dwe no koraa no:"
Na ne mbiew mu ehuon yɛ fɔɔfɔɔ no a."

column2: "Na obi so wu wɔ ne kra awerɛhow mu
column3: Na ɔnnsɔ ndzepa no bi nnhwɛ da."
hɔn nyinara deda pɛr wɔ huntuma mu
minyim hom adwen
column4: Na tsirmpɔw a hom susu no bɔn mu tsia me no."

column3: Bapɔmba no ne fie wɔ henfa seseiara? Na hen na dzebɔnyɛnyi no ne tsenabew no wɔ?"

column2: "Ana hom mmbisaa hɔn a wɔfa kwan no do no? Ana hom adwendwen hɔn amandzɛɛbɔ ho?"
"Dɛ wɔakora nyimpa bɔn do efi sɛɛ da no mu? Na woeyi no efi ebufuw da no mu da?"
"Woana na ɔka n’enyim wɔ ne ndzeyɛɛ ho? Na dza ɔayɛ no
column3: woana na obotua no ho kaw?"

column2: "Wɔsoa no enyidzi mu kɔ adakamona mu
column3: Na wɔweɔn ne nda no."

column2: "Nyimpadɔm dzi n’enyim na n’ekyir kɔ efunsiebea
column3: Na dɛtsetɔw mpo ma no asomdwee."

column2: "Ntsi ebɛn kwan do na hom dze nsɛnhun kyekye mo werɛ? Osiandɛ hom nsɛnkaa nyina yɛ atorsɛm."
